page.title: 13EMMA'S DAY IN HAXEY
page.content: At about 10.30,Joanne called for me.Joanne,Bruce and me,climbed over the back fence.Bruce and me have a den there.We jumped the dyke a few times and then we walked up field and back down again.Flash,the neighbours dog,came up to us and we played with him.When 11.30 came round,mum called us inside.She gave us a glass of orange squash and a piece of shortbread each.Joanne adores that!Joanne had to go at 12.30,so I had lunch then.I had this:A quarter-pounder beef-burger in a bread bun,the kind with sesame seeds on.I also had some ice-cream with a mini-mars stuck in it.Bruce squashed his mars with his fist. We both had an apple to finish with.We spent the afternoon in the garden,and behind the fence.At 4.15,mum called me in to change for
